compliant.section: For the collection, processing and use the personal data, we continuously monitor and manage by the principle of not exceeding the specific purpose and not making secondary purpose.

If we engage a third-party supplier to process the Personal Data, the Processor will be subject to binding contractual obligations to: l only process the personal data in accordance with the purpose of our prior written instructions; and l establish mechanism to protect the security of personal data in compliance with requirements under applicable law and regulations.
compliant.legal provisions: Data processing agreements and security obligations for processors

compliant.section: We will do our best to take reasonable measure to protect the security of your personal data (including but not limited to equipment security management and data security auditing mechanism, such as encryption mechanism, firewall etc).

With respect to personal data, you have the right to claim/request under the legally premise: (1) Refuse to provide your personal data: However, if you choose not to provide your personal data, we may not be able to completely provide the relevant functions or services of our website.
compliant.legal provisions: Right to withdraw consent and restrictions on processing

compliant.section: The right to withdraw your consent: Withdraw your consent will not affect the legality of processing your personal data by Wiwynn on the basis of your previous consent.

non_compliant.section: Unless otherwise agreed, we will retain the personal data within 5 years in principle or the period in accordance with the extinction of specific purpose for collection or the expiration of agreement term (the longer period will prevail).
non_compliant.amend: Specify a clear and lawful basis for data retention and ensure that personal data is not kept longer than necessary for the specified purpose.  Consider implementing a data retention policy that outlines the criteria for determining retention periods.

non_compliant.section: We will perpetually delete, destroy or anonymously dispose the personal data after the expiration of above retention period.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')
non_compliant.amend: While anonymization is a valid data processing method, "perpetual" deletion might not always be feasible.  Clarify the methods used for data deletion and ensure they align with GDPR requirements.

non_compliant.section: We are not responsible for any content, products or services offered on any third-party websites. Links to third-party websites are provided for your convenience only. This Privacy Policy will not apply to any personal data that you provide to, or that is collected by, any third-party website operator. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of those other websites.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Accountability and responsibility for onward transfers
non_compliant.amend: While not directly non-compliant, this section raises concerns about accountability for data shared with third parties.  Provide more specific information about data sharing practices with third parties, including the types of data shared and the safeguards in place to protect personal data.
